---
name: Feature Spec
about: Standard format for new feature specs
title: "[Spec] "
labels: spec
assignees: ''
---

## Feature name
e.g. Capital Gains v1

## Problem
- What problem are we solving?
- Why now?

## Proposed Solution
- Key inputs
- Outputs
- Business logic / rules

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Inputs validated
- [ ] Outputs match expected cases
- [ ] Edge cases considered

## Dependencies
- Related issues/PRs

## Risks
- What could break?

---
